update img_watermark
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alpha = #{alpha,jdbcType=TINYINT},
fiducial_point = #{fiducialPoint,jdbcType=BIT},
margin_top = #{marginTop,jdbcType=INTEGER},
margin_bottom = #{marginBottom,jdbcType=INTEGER},

icon_image_height = #{iconImageHeight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
last_modified_time = #{lastModifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
where watermark_id = #{watermarkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update img_watermark set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alpha = #{alpha,jdbcType=TINYINT}, fiducial_point = #{fiducialPoint,jdbcType=BIT}, margin_top = #{marginTop,jdbcType=INTEGER}, margin_bottom = #{marginBottom,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sys_id = #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dealer_id = #{dealerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_modified_time = #{lastModifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT} where watermark_id = #{watermarkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
